hero.headline: We transform ideas into scalable digital products

company.name: PibeLabs
company.description: Technology innovation studio founded by Lucas Benavidez and Juan Cruz Ferri, specialized in web development, artificial intelligence, UX/UI design and cloud solutions.

services.subtitle: Comprehensive Technology Solutions

services.cta: Can't find what you need? We work with custom solutions.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Senior team with international track record
about.description: PibeLabs was born from the shared vision of Lucas Benavidez and Juan Cruz Ferri: combining technical excellence with product mindset. With experience in Y2C startups, international consultancies and Fortune 500 companies, we understand both code and business.

quality.title: Non-negotiable quality
